profile:
Glacier Drywall Systems Inc. is a full service insulation, drywall and ceiling texture company. We have a dedicated crew that do exceptionally high quality work.
 
Whether you are completing a renovation of an existing home or building a new home, we have the skill to deliver the high quality finish that you are looking for.
 
Glacier Drywall is committed to meeting the needs of our clients by providing top quality service. Professional and courteous service, attention to detail and customer satisfaction are at the core of our work.
 
Glacier Drywall Systems Inc services include:
·         Drywall boarding and taping process
·         Ceiling texture of all types
·         Hand troweled L-5 ceiling finishes
·         Ceiling conversions from stipple to knockdown, splatter coat or L-5 ceiling finishes
·         Insulation & vapor barrier for ERS (energuide rating system), sound abatement, and blow-fill attic top-ups
·         Renovations, additions, expansions of sq footage, basement development and garages
·         Insulation, drywall & texture for new custom home construction
·         T-bar and ceiling tile installation
·         Repairs – no job is too small
·         light duty framing (steel and wood)
·         Fire-chasing – legal suite code compliance in homes and above garage living spaces
 
Glacier Drywall carries 3rd party liability insurance, our workers are WCB insured, and we are an A+ accredited member company of the BBB for 6 years now.
name: Glacier Drywall Systems Inc

profile:
Don’t worry… We don’t charge for elbow grease!
MKZ Construction works diligently to understand your home renovation project and provide you with the most accurate quote possible. Instead, they would work hard to come in on budget rather than give you the news that it’s going over. MKZ wants to be your go-to contractor for every home renovation project, so they have partnered only with suppliers and manufacturers that match their high standards. You get quality products, they earn your trust. It’s a win-win for everyone.

Max, a leader in his field, has hand-picked a team of professionals who work together to maintain their strong industry reputation. Choosing MKZ eliminates stress and worry because cutting corners is not an option when it comes to completing your valued project.

Services:
Trust the MKZ team to bring your vision to life.

Steel Stud Framing
Insulation Services
Soundproofing
Drywall Installation
Drywall Repairs
Taping & Sanding
Popcorn Removal
Textured Ceilings
Level 5 Ceilings (smooth finish)
Ceiling Repairs
Suspended Ceilings
Restorations after Flood/Fire
Painting

What we do
Our past projects include both new construction and repairs/restorations. Occupied and fully operational job sites are never a problem, and we can plan, manage, and build multi-phase jobs.

Working Together
We offer an end-to-end client experience with seamless communication, budgeting, staffing, on-site organization, and solid, quality handiwork every time.

Did You Know
Did you know we are a proud member of the Better Business Bureau (BBB)? We have worked with homeowners and designers to produce work we think you’ll love.

profile:
Baki's Texturing is your premiere Ceiling texturing choice for Calgary and area.

A Proud Canadian born and raised in Calgary Alberta leading with over a decade of texturing experience with new construction, renovations, basements, apartment complexes or any other commercial or residential application you can imagine.  Backed by the King of Spray Machines, the SprayKing 200, Baki's Texturing can provide quality texturing services at a competitive price with the volume and speed other Calgary contractors cannot offer.

No matter if you are looking for Spantex knockdown, texture re-whitening, popcorn or orange peel texturing, resurfacing or repairs or something more unique contact Shane Baki at 403.402.5571 today to book your FREE consultation and estimate.
products:
* Knockdown
   * Regular texture (popcorn)
   * Splatter coat
   * Orange peel
   * Two tone knockdown
   * Paint priming
  * Ceiling texture rewhitening
  * Ceiling texture removal
   * Textured feature walls
  *  Spray oilbase paint and pre coat
  *  Ceiling borders
  *  Water damaged ceiling repairs
   * Yellow stained ceiling repairs
   * Drywall and taping issues
services: We are available for texturing full houses, basements, garages, condos, warehouse and office space and anywhere else you can imagine ceiling texturing
name: Baki's Ceiling Texturing
